appendix.title: Books Revision History
appendix.para: Many readers have been asking us to keep track of specific changes to the book content, the following sections list changes made to the book in reverse chronological order starting with ${project.version}.

section.title: Changes in Edition 2.5
section.para: The following changes were introduced in Edition 2.5 in June, 2010:

listitem.para: Upgraded to Nexus 1.7.0.
Added description of drill down searches in Nexus 1.7.
Modified language in the Managing Groups section to reflect that groups can now contain multiple repositories as well as other groups.

section.title: Changes in Edition 2.4.1
section.para: The following changes were introduced in Edition 2.4.1 in June, 2010:

listitem.para: Changed the Table of Contents in the ePub edition of the book. The presence of a large, detailed Table of Contents at the beginning of an eBook seems redundant when you use a reader with a built in index. Based on initial testing with the iBook reader on an iPad, it was decided to reduce the length of the Table of Contents. In this version, the table of contents only displays chapter titles. (NXBOOK-471)
Added a cover to the ePub version of the book. (NXBOOK-472)
Checked code and programlisting line widths. Lines do not wrap when font is on normal within the iBook reader. (NXBOOK-474)

Added Completed Docbook metadata (authors, publish date, abstract, publisher information). This changes improves metadata display in ePub readers. (NXBOOK-476, NXBOOK-484, NXBOOK-482, NXBOOK-481, NXBOOK-483, NXBOOK-479, NXBOOK-480, NXBOOK-477)
